review: I have 2 cheomecasts.  They were great for a few weeks.  I mean the coolest thing since sliced bread.  However after an update 3 months ago the stream NEVER goes HD now.  I have the best Internet available to xfinity customers.  So I know it isn't my connection.  My smart TV never loses focus on Netflix.  Three out of every four times using it, during an episode on netflix it will buffer to 99% and stay there.  Only way to fix it is turning off the TV and rebooting chromecast.  Was the coolest thing ever but now nothing more than a pain.  Hoping the amazon fire stick will be better.  To bad Google won't give me my money back :(
